verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְתוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> of praise הָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> Make a joyful noise לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> all ye lands

עִבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> Serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּשִׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> with gladness בֹּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> come לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> before his presence בִּרְנָנָֽה׃ <S%H7445><s%> with singing

דְּע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> Know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> ye that the LORD ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> Himself אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> he [is] God הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> Himself עָ֭שָׂנוּ <S%H6213><s%> [it is] he [that] hath made [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֣ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) אֲנַ֑חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves עַ֝מּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> us and not we ourselves [we are] his people וְצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> and the sheep מַרְעִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4830><s%> of his pasture

בֹּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> Enter שְׁעָרָ֨יו ׀ <S%H8179><s%> into his gates בְּתוֹדָ֗ה <S%H8426><s%> with thanksgiving חֲצֵרֹתָ֥יו <S%H2691><s%> [and] into his courts בִּתְהִלָּ֑ה <S%H8416><s%> with praise הֽוֹדוּ־ <S%H3034><s%> be thankful ל֝֗וֹ בָּרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> unto him [and] bless שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> his name

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good יְ֭הֹוָה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [is] everlasting חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> his mercy וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against דֹּ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> [endureth] to all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <S%H1755><s%> generations אֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H530><s%> and his truth
